title: Ukrainian intelligence confirms systemic Russian military use of Starlink
summary: Ukrainian intelligence confirmed "systemic" Russian military use of Starlink terminals since February 2024, with Russians acquiring them through third countries, demonstrating compromise of critical US space infrastructure.

sources.title: Russian military reportedly using Starlink inside Ukraine

Ukrainian intelligence says Russia using Starlink satellite Internet system for combat operations

Russia's forces are illegally using Starlink terminals against Ukraine

notes: Critical infrastructure compromise enabling enemy military operations. Multiple sources confirm systemic Russian military acquisition and use of Starlink terminals.
